text: Motion
Ah...

Hey, Amana-chan, don't you think there's a
really nice smell coming from somewhere?

Hmm... you're right!
...It's kinda sweet and sour...
It's a nice scent~
...Maybe it's the flowers...?

Right?
It's soft... and really calming.
Hehe, seems like the season has changed.
Motion

...Is it beyond the guardrail?
...Oh...! But it's right in the shade.

It's a bit disappointing that we can't see
what kind of flowers they are.
Yeah, but...

Because we don't know what kind of flowers they are,
we can focus on the scent, maybe.

Huh?
What do you mean?

Hehe, well...
For example--

When you see plum blossoms, you might just say,
"It smells like plums!" and leave it at that, right?

But if you don't know what kind of flower it is...
You might think about it being sweet, soft, and refreshing...

It feels like you can carefully match each thought
with a word... and face it head-on, one by one.
Hehe, let's use our imagination!

I wonder what kind of flower it is...
it makes me so excited!

Yeah, it's exciting...
So... can we walk a little slower?
Motion
